pkgmetadata.longdescription: # Curses PlusExtension library to curses## How To InstallUse ```pip3 install cursesplus```on Linux or ```py -m pip install cursesplus```on Windows### SPECIAL INSTRUCTIONS FOR WINDOWSFor Windows you need to also install ```windows-curses``` or related programto provide the basic curses functionality## What's New?## Version 2.9-Move curses transitions to transitions module-Remains backwards-compatible## DocumentationTODO
